name: officedev-copilot-for-m365-plugins-samples-msgext-doc-search-js
title: Enable Hybrid Search (Vector + Semantic) for your external data on Copilot for Microsoft 365 using Cognitive Search
shortDescription: This sample implements Cognitive Search with a Teams message extension that enables Hybrid Search (Vector + Semantic) and can be used as a plugin for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365.
longDescription: This sample implements Cognitive Search with a Teams message extension that enables Hybrid Search (Vector + Semantic) and can be used as a plugin for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365. It demonstrates how developers can use Copilot for Microsoft 365 in **Bring Your Own Data** scenarios instead of building a custom GPT powered bot.

thumbnails.alt: Using Copilot for Microsoft 365 in **Bring Your Own Data** scenarios instead of building a custom GPT powered bot
Simplified admin experience in Microsoft Teams admin center
